StringProperty.Name: ProjectType_
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the project type (e.g. 'project' for PLM projects or 'acfproject' for ACF projects).

StringProperty.Name: GenerateOptions_
StringProperty.Description: Additional generate options can be specified here. These options will be appended to the PLCnCLI generate command. See "plcncli generate all --help" command for information about available options.

StringProperty.Name: BuildOptions_
StringProperty.Description: Additional build options can be specified here. These options will be appended to the PLCnCLI build command. See "plcncli build --help" command for information about available options.

StringProperty.Name: DeployOptions_
StringProperty.Description: Additional deploy options can be specified here. These options will be appended to the PLCnCLI deploy command. See "plcncli deploy --help" command for information about available options.
